resources.string: HCJB Global Sweden is an organization spreading the word about Jesus Christ. The organization is a part of HCJB Global. \nRead more about HCJB Global Sweden(Swedish only) \nRead more about HCJB Global

This application is a completely new way to read the Bible, created by HCJB Global Sweden. 

When Easter Week is started (either manually by setting a date, or waiting for the real Easter week to begins), you will follow Christ in real time from when he enters Jerusalem until he meets his followers after the resurrection. Bible texts from all four gospels are notified during the days (and nights!) until Easter Day. Please expect that you have to spend some time together with this application to follow Christ this week; More than one hundred bible texts will be notified and displayed! 

Once all the bible texts are read, additional features are unlocked on the start screen. 

This application has been made to bring the suffering and sacrifice of Christ to mind during Easter week. 

The background image is a painting by Diego Velázquez, available as Public Domain picture from Wikipedia. 

The origin of the background photo (empty tomb) is unknown. 

Bible texts are from Svenska Folkbibeln (Swedish) and the NET Bible (English).

Now, you have lived one week together with Christ. Do you want to follow Christ for the rest of your life? 

The Bible tells us that "if you confess with your mouth that Jesus is Lord and believe in your heart that God raised him from the dead, you will be saved. " (Rom. 10:9) 

That is all you need to do to be saved! Press the buttons below for assistance in the three steps: 
1. Pray the salvation prayer! 
2. Find a church, and tell others about your faith! 
3. Share with us that you have received Christ!
Please contact HCJB Global if you need assistance in finding a church: info@hcjb.org
